com.paydiant.android.core.service

Interface IUserRegistrationManagerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserRegistrationManagerService

    public interface IUserRegistrationManagerService
    The Interface IUserRegistrationManagerService. This interface contains the method signatures of the methods which are used to manage customer specific actions such as validating email, validating username and updating passcode etc.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Detail

      • validateEmailAddress

        @Deprecated
boolean validateEmailAddress(ValidateEmail validateEmail)
        Deprecated. Use of this method is discouraged.
        Validate email address. This method validates a given email address.
        Parameters:
        validateEmail - the validate email contains the email address string
        Returns:
        true, if email is validated. 417 (EXPECTATION_FAILED) - whitelisted non existing email address 404 (NOT_FOUND) - email address is not in database and not in white-list

      • retrieveMfaQuestions

        MFAQuestionList retrieveMfaQuestions()
        Retrieve mfa questions. This methods retrieves the set of MFA questions which are saved for the current user.
        Returns:
        the mFA questions list, The list of MFA questions.

      • registerUser

        CreatedCustomer registerUser(CreateCustomer customer)
        Register user. This method is used to register a new customer.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer with the populated data such as name, last name, email and phone.
        Returns:
        the created customer
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes

        400 (BAD_REQUEST) - If at least one argument is empty. 416 (REQUESTED_RANGE_NOT_SATISFIABLE) - If the email is already exists. 417 (EXPECTATION_FAILED) - If the username is already exists. 500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - If the user registration is failed. 404 (NOT_FOUND) - If user is whitelisted, but not found in database. 418 (I_AM_A_TEAPOT) - if user's email verification failed. 419(INSUFFICIENT_SPACE_ON_RESOURCE) - Password field validation error. 420(METHOD_FAILURE) - Passcode field validation error. 400 (BAD_REQUEST) - Error in password or passcode validation. 511(NETWORK_AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED) - Application Instance Not Verified Error

      • updateUser

        UpdatedCustomerStatus updateUser(UpdateCustomer updateCustomer)
        Update user.
        Parameters:
        updateCustomer - the update customer object contains the data about the existing customer such as first name, last name etc.
        Returns:
        the updated customer status

      • resendVerificationEmail

        Message resendVerificationEmail(ValidateUsername validateUsername)
        Re-sends verification email to the provided user.
        Parameters:
        validateUsername - username or the email address
        Returns:
        Any messages sent by the server upon success.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes

        500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - message could not be sent
        Since:
        4.5.0.2

      • registerUser

        RegisterCustomerResponse registerUser(Customer customer)
        Register user.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer
        Returns:
        the register customer response 400(BAD_REQUEST) - Invalid arguments 500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) -Internal server error 416(REQUESTED_RANGE_NOT_SATISFIABLE) - Email already exists 404(NOT_FOUND) - User is not found in email whitelist 401(UNAUTHORIZED) - Unauthorized due to invalid nonce 408(REQUEST_TIMEOUT) - Passcode field validation error 410(GONE) - MFA is empty error
        Since:
        5.3.0.1
